text:
="preserve">Ulla Pia (17 February 1945 – 22 August 2020) was a Danish pop jazz singer. She was born in Copenhagen. Pia was best known internationally for her participation in the 1966 Eurovision Song Contest with her song "Stop - mens legen er go'" ("Stop, While the Going's Good").
Pia died in Copenhagen on 22 August 2020 from cancer, aged 75.
